title: Game crashes after champion select
body:
Hi i've gotten Game crashes after champion select error 7 times. Iv'e reinstalled it, repaired it. I wiped it from my PC. it'll work for a couple of days then it constantly crashes. so i get ban  timers for no reason. Iv'e searched google for some answers an they didn't work for me.  I  would like to know your thoughts 

From a paying happy customer. 

Quickly GET TO THE CHOPPER 
XD

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds odd that this is only occurring after a few days of playing just fine, have you noticed any data loss recently?

Have there been any patches within the timeframe of it going from working to not working?

Hey 

It started when the open client beta came out. it worked for awhile on that but then it didn't. I haven't found any loss of data. As far as i'm concerned the latest patch might have something to do with it.
